questions.question_text: Your customer has a catalog item for Request VPN. They would like to adjust the cart layout for only the VPN item, so the Quantity field is not displayed. How would you meet this requirement?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
The correct answer is C. On the Catalog Item, Advanced View, unselect Use cart layout, select No quantity.
Here's why:
In ServiceNow, to adjust the cart layout for a specific catalog item so that the Quantity field is not displayed, you need to modify the settings at the catalog item level. By going to the Advanced View of the specific catalog item and unselecting Use cart layout, and then selecting No quantity, you ensure that the Quantity field is hidden only for that particular item.
In Washington, you go to Maintain Cart Layouts, select Target Type:Browser Screen => Cart Preview Screen => columns tab and deselect Quantity column.
